name: Gallabox
description:
Gallabox is a cutting-edge WhatsApp automation platform designed to revolutionize business communications. Our platform empowers businesses to streamline and enhance their interactions with customers through automated, intelligent messaging. 

It offers a range of features to enhance customer engagement and support, including AI Chatbot, Shared Inbox, CRMs and E-stores Integration, Drip Campaigns, etc
focus_areas: No-code Chatbot: Automates customer queries and FAQs using a no-code interface.
Shared Team Inbox: Allows multiple agents to collaborate on customer chats from a single workspace.
Broadcasts: Enables businesses to send targeted messages to specific customer segments.
